transmittal.com.tbitsGlobal.server.cache
Class TrnCacheManager

java.lang.Object
  transmittal.com.tbitsGlobal.server.cache.TrnCacheManager

public class TrnCacheManager
extends java.lang.Object

This is a global manager for all the cache's defined for transmittal plugin Any new cache instance must first register/add itself with this in order to be activated.

Author:
devashish

public void registerCache(net.sf.ehcache.Ehcache cache)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                          net.sf.ehcache.ObjectExistsException,
                          net.sf.ehcache.CacheException

Parameters:
cache: - Cache to be registered
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - :
net.sf.ehcache.ObjectExistsException - : If the cache already exists
net.sf.ehcache.CacheException - : If there was an error creating the cache
